description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NoteEditor' which manages the UI and behavior for editing notes, including rendering the layout, handling state, subscribing to external updates, and saving changes.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component for editing notes, managing UI layout, state, and interactions.

methods.name: $queueAutoSave
methods.description: Queues an automatic save of the note after a debounce delay to prevent frequent saves during rapid edits.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Saves the current note, optionally as an explicit save, updating the note's title and content.
